name: Depths Of Horror: Mushroom Day
description:
Depths Of Horror: Mushroom Day - is a 3D first-person adventure and horror game that lets you plunge deep into your fears.

During the National Mushroom Day holiday you decided to try your hand at mushroom picking.
While picking mushrooms in a clearing, you stumble upon an abandoned hut. Exploring it, you find yourself in a cave full of unexpected inhabitants and "surprises". From this point on, your fight for survival begins, which means you have the opportunity to test your wits and endurance.



Can you find your way out of the cave, bypassing enemies and various obstacles, and gain a worthy victory over evil and your fears?

Key Features:

  • unique system of hand-crafted caves
  • frequent events will not make you bored
  • enemies and screamers
  • monologues of the main character
  • interaction with the environment, use of objects
  • save points
  • good graphics and great optimization
  • atmospheric sounds and music
  • Steam achievements
